name: 2020.01/ProjetoIII/Black Hole War
description: Black Hole War is a survival game based on a space war against black holes.  In a spatial scenery where black holes apear and spaceships come througth them with the only purpose to destroy all forms of life being the only chance all worlds have is a spaceship lead by you. Your duty is to put an end to this threat and give back peace to those who can't protect themselves. The gameplay is about moving around the space  and shooting the enemies trying to protect the planets from destruction. Also you have to avoid crashing into enemies spaceships and for that you can use your nitro ability to escape from tough situations. As you play many power ups might apear to give you a little advantage against your intergalactical enemies. Colect them to get stronger! Use your skills and and your spacial wars strategies to take all enemies down and restore peace to space. Download this game for free now and save all forms of life. The destiny of the galaxy is in your hands, Commander!
